text:
I don't know if I have a bug, or it changed since version 1.3; I am nolonger 
able to get MultiViews to work. I have the httpd.conf setup the same way as I 
did before in the earlier version and it doesn't work! Is it a bug? or did it 
change?
creator: dotcomtim@hotmail.com

text:
No bug I can see (your description misses the interesting things). However, your
setup may be influenced by the MultiViewsMatch directive (see mod_mime docs).

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
